entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain beginning near noon. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
